segments.text: I see the water spilling everywhere, and it’s making me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are going to fall, and she won’t even notice until it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tilting, and the boy is reaching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless the woman is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the floor, and she’s just ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to step in and stop this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is just infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how oblivious everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR
